# insert using select with auto-inc column using vitess sequence
"insert into user_extra(user_id) select id from user"
{
  "QueryType": "INSERT",
  "Original": "insert into user_extra(user_id) select id from user",
  "Instructions": {
    "OperatorType": "Insert",
    "Variant": "Select",
    "Keyspace": {
      "Name": "user",
      "Sharded": true
    },
    "TargetTabletType": "PRIMARY",
    "AutoIncrement": "main:1",
    "MultiShardAutocommit": false,
    "TableName": "user_extra",
    "VindexOffsetFromSelect": {
      "user_index": "[0]"
    },
    "Inputs": [
      {
        "OperatorType": "Route",
        "Variant": "Scatter",
        "Keyspace": {
          "Name": "user",
          "Sharded": true
        },
        "FieldQuery": "select id from `user` where 1 != 1",
        "Query": "select id from `user` for update",
        "Table": "`user`"
      }
    ]
  }
}
Gen4 plan same as above
